data.text: @Timmys_Coffee Consoles are legit pricey af and games go up 10 $ every year with new consoles out based games are going to be 89.99 ,99,99 soon and it wont even be a full game i feel ya about consoles i bought mine by accident so i kept it cause resell value is always crap and cheap :/
@Timmys_Coffee @layshah1 Hopefully can find a deal sooner than later.
@AceValour @layshah1 The black Friday deal was so good 😭😭
@Timmys_Coffee @layshah1 I completely agree with you when I look at the price of the ps4 I DansGame af so I can see why you want to try and get a deal on it.
@AgilePure Lol. It's more morals than money. I think it's gross that they're trying to sell consoles for that much still.
@AceValour @layshah1 Just can't justify paying what they cost now considering "new" gen consoles aren't really that new anymore. Seems stupid.
@Timmys_Coffee just make lay pay the difference if he wants to watch you stream again Kappa

@Timmys_Coffee @layshah1 I don't think you missed anymore sales. Would have been through boxing day more than likely the last sales for it. Unless you are able to find some sort of sale online by chance like Amazon or something. Even then. Might have to wait until I'd say spring?

@layshah1 I don't even know wtf to do. Like do sales even exist at any other time than what I just missed? I desperately do not want to pay more than $300, cod ww2 and taxes included lol. Anything more than that makes me broker than the joke I already am.
